# eventAttribution

**Instance Property**

An object you use to send tap event attribution data to the browser for Private Click Measurement.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var eventAttribution: UIEventAttribution? { get set }
```

## Discussion

For more information about preparing event attribution data, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIEventAttribution].
